Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Creator \Cre*a"tor\ (kr[-e]*[=a]"t[~e]r), n. [L. creator: cf. F. cr['e]ateur.] One who creates, produces, or constitutes. Specifically, the Supreme Being. [1913 Webster]
To sin's rebuke and my Creater's praise. --Shak. [1913 Webster]
The poets and artists of Greece, who are at the same time its prophets, the creators of its divinities, and the revealers of its theological beliefs. --Caird. [1913 Webster]
Creator n 1: terms referring to the Judeo-Christian God [syn: {Godhead}, {Lord}, {Maker}, {Divine}, {God Almighty}, {Almighty}, {Jehovah}] 2: a person who grows or makes or invents things
